DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , double-blind , single-center , controlled phase III clinical trial . The purpose study evaluate immunogenicity safety investigational 23-valent pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine ( PPV ) manufacture Sinovac Biotech Co. , Ltd . The primary objective study demonstrate immunogenicity investigational vaccine non-inferior commercialized 23-valent PPV manufacture Chengdu Institute Biological product Co. , Ltd. ; secondary objective ass safety investigational control vaccine . Participants group three cohort age : child cohort ( 2 - 17 year old ) , adult cohort ( 18 - 60 year old ) elderly cohort ( ≥ 61 year old ) . In cohort , participant randomly assign experimental group control group ratio 1:1 .
